panels.description: The total number of tasks created.

panels.description: The maximum execution time in ms for polling across all running tasks of this thread.

panels.description: The average execution time in ms for committing, across all running tasks of this thread.

panels.description: The average number of polls per second.
panels.title: Poll Rate

panels.description: The total number of commit calls across all tasks.
panels.title: Commit Total

panels.description: The total number of poll calls across all tasks.
panels.title: Poll Total

panels.description: The total number of process calls across all tasks.
panels.title: Process Total

panels.description: The average execution time in ms for processing, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Process Latency Avg

panels.description: The average number of process calls per second.
panels.title: Process Rate

panels.description: Number of online brokers on the cluster. The metric is based on the number of leaders on tthe broker
panels.title: Number of Brokers Online

panels.description: Number of active controllers in the cluster. Alert if value is anything other than 1.
panels.title: Active Controllers

panels.description:
Unclean leader election rate.
Unclean leader elections occur when there is no qualified partition leader among Kafka brokers
panels.title: Unclean Leader Election Rate

panels.description: The number of partitions under the minimum In-Sync Replica (ISR) count. The ISR count indicates the set of replicas that are up-to-date with the leader.
panels.title: Online Partitions

panels.description: GCs per second over the last 5 minutes,
panels.title: Time spent in GC

panels.description: The number of partitions that have not been fully replicated in the follower replicas.
panels.title: Under-replicated Partitions

panels.description: The number of partitions that have not been fully replicated in the follower replicas.
panels.title: Under-replicated Partitions

panels.description: Brokers UP
panels.title: Kafka Status

panels.description: %CPU usage per instance
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
1-The rate at which individual messages are consumed by the broker.
2--The rate at which individual messages are produced by the broker.
panels.title: Messages Per Topic - In x Out

panels.description: The number of replicas for which this broker is the leader
panels.title: Partitions per Leader

panels.description:
1-The rate at which data sent from producers is consumed by the broke
2-The rate at which data is fetched and read from the broker by consumers.
panels.title: Bytes In/Out Per Second

panels.description: The rate at which data is fetched and read from the broker by consumers.
panels.title: Bytes Out Per Second

panels.description: The rate at which data is sent from the broker to other brokers. This metric is useful to monitor if the broker is a leader for a group of partitions.
panels.title: Replication In (bytes/s)

panels.description: Provides information on a Java Virtual Machine installed on the server that executes the jmx-exporter
panels.title: Processos Java

panels.description: The size of requests, in bytes, made for the request type identified by the request property of the MBean name. Separate MBeans for all available request types are listed under the RequestBytes node.
panels.title: Bytes requested / sec

panels.description: The number of partitions under the minimum In-Sync Replica (ISR) count. The ISR count indicates the set of replicas that are up-to-date with the leader.
panels.title: kafka_cluster_partition_underminisr

panels.description: The rate at which data sent from other brokers is consumed by the follower broker.
panels.title: Replication In (bytes/s)

panels.description: The rate at which the number of ISRs in the broker decreases
panels.title: Reducao de InSyncReplica

panels.description:
1-The number of fetch requests in the fetch purgatory
2-The number of send requests in the producer purgatory.
panels.title: Delayed Operations

panels.description: The status of the brokers connection to Zookeeper.
panels.title: Zookeeper disconnects / sec

panels.description:
1-The amount of time it takes for the server to respond to a client request.
2-The amount of time it takes for the server to respond to a client request.
3-The amount of time it takes for the server to respond to a client request.
panels.title: Request Latency - Max x Min x Avg

panels.description: Minimum number of servers required to run the Zookeeper
panels.title: Quorum size

panels.description: The total count of client connections.
panels.title: Alive Connections

panels.description: Number of watchers over Zookeeper znodes.
panels.title: Watchers

panels.description: The number of znodes in the ZooKeeper namespace (the data).
panels.title: Znodes

panels.description: The number of queued requests when the server is under load and is receiving more sustained requests than it can process.
panels.title: Queued requests
